data.title: Leaves a lot to be desired
data.text: The outdoor patio is noisy, hot, because of the location near air conditioners and the wall of dark windows reflecting intense heat.  The bar selection is whiskey mostly and the chair set-up is too open.  I think the location is just plain wrong.

owner_response.author: Terry V, Owner at Dive, responded to this review
owner_response.text: OK. Thanks for your input. Kind Regards.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Relaxing and great service
data.text: A great place to visit with friends and unwind. Enjoy sitting on the patio or inside. Great music and service.

owner_response.author: Terry V, Owner at Dive, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your kind review. Very pleased you enjoyed your experience with us.
Thanks, 
Terry V.
owner/gm
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great patio!
data.text: We stopped by for happy hour on the patio and had a great experience.  The service, beer, wine, and atmosphere were all great.

owner_response.author: Terry V, Owner at Dive, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Very gratified that you enjoyed!
See you soon and Cheers,
Terry V.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great bar in The Lismore Hotel
data.text: This bar is called The Dive because it is located where the pool used to be...NOT because it is a grungy dive bar.  It's the opposite actually without being uppity or snooty. . .grab a beer or a wine or a glass of whiskey, sit out on the deck, and enjoy the passage of time in relaxed style.  We love The Dive, and I know that you will, too.

owner_response.author: Terry V, General Manager at Dive, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello and Thanks for your kind words! We're very pleased you love Dive! And thank you very much for the recommendation. 


Best Regards, Terry V.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Feel of a Big City Patio in EC
data.text: Went to Dive after dinner downstairs .  It was a beatiful night on the patio having beers with friends.  The service was great and so was the atmosphere .

owner_response.author: Harlie J, Public Relations Manager at Dive, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for stopping by Dive! We are glad you enjoyed your time here. We hope to see you around!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great drinks
data.text: Very solid Old Fashioned. Much better than any I've ever had in Eau Claire. Would recommend and going to try out hotel next time I'm here.

owner_response.author: Harlie J, Public Relations Manager at Dive, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for stopping by Dive. We look forward to seeing you around again sometime!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice rooftop bar.
data.text: The rooftop bar was a great place to sit and have a beverage.  However, the beverages were below average, and over-priced compared to other establishments nearby.  They need to work on making higher quality drinks if they want to charge higher prices.  Go for the experience, but be prepared to pay for it.

data.title: Creative cocktails
data.text: The cocktails were creative and delicious. The seating is comfortable. There are large chairs with a table, couches, bar, and outside seating available.
